title: (MAINTENANCE) Scheduled downtime for Promotion APIs
content: To support the Black Friday campaign, the **Promotion APIs** will undergo maintenance and will be temporarily unavailable. Normal operations will resume after the maintenance is complete. ðŸ“Œ Maintenance schedule: 2024.11.22 06:00 AM - 2024.11.27 06:00 AM (PST) **Affected markets**: United States **Affected APIs during the maintenance period**: * Create Activity API * Update Activity API * Deactivate Activity API * Get Activity API * Search Activities API * Update Activity Product API * Remove Activity Product API * Get Coupon API * Search Coupons API
